snippet.title: Commander Weapons?! - "Arsenal" Early Access Update for Survivor Mercs - Trailer
snippet.description:
Commanders, our 5th major Early Access update for Survivor Mercs is now live on Steam!

Every Commander clone now gets a weapon - aim, fire, control the engagement! New "marked" effect and lots other improvements, including many new languages.

Get the game: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2141520?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=base&utm_medium=web

Join our official Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/nWQVgDNErd

Find the full release notes on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/2141520/view/4616839976793217373?l=english

This trailer shows exclusively Early Access in-game footage of the latest content in Survivor Mercs.
-----------------------------------------------------------
Survive. Loot. Extract. Repeat!
Master the individual quirks of over 15,000 commanders. Lead your mercenary squad against a relentless army. Dominate the battlefield. Get the loot - or die trying! This horde survival squad-builder tests your wits and skill. 

Lock, load, and loot, Commander!
-----------------------------------------------------------
Survivor Mercs blends twin-stick shooter, bullet-heaven, and extraction shooter into a high risk, high reward roguelike - with a squad, randomized heroes, procedural maps, and lots of loot.

If Vampire Survivors, Brotato, 20 Minutes Till Dawn, Rogue Legacy, and Zero Sievert had a bastard child - this is Survivor Mercs!
